profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the application of AI within a cloud-based customer service solution, emphasizing sales, business value, and customer interaction. While AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities revolve around technical sales strategy, product demonstration, and business requirements assessment, rather than the development, fine-tuning, or deep technical implementation of AI models themselves. The role appears to be more of a technical sales or solutions architect role that leverages AI concepts rather than a role that builds or engineers AI systems. Therefore, it does not fit the core definitions of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer needs, translating them into technical solutions, and highlighting the business value of Service Cloud. Phrases like 'clear vision how AI and Agentic systems will help define the customer service of the future', 'communicate a tailored view of our Service product offerings', 'highlight the business value', 'solicit business requirements', 'develop a technical sales strategy', and 'Business requirements assessment and delivery of findings including key difficulties, proposed solutions to meet business needs, and return on investment' directly map to understanding business context and aligning technical offerings.
job_tasks.phrase: clear vision how AI and Agentic systems will help define the customer service of the future

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer needs and aligning technical solutions with business goals. Phrases like 'solicit business requirements', 'develop a technical sales strategy', and 'Business requirements assessment and delivery of findings including key difficulties, proposed solutions to meet business needs, and return on investment where applicable' clearly indicate this focus.

The primary goal of removing technical objections and highlighting business value aligns with understanding the business context and strategic goals. Phrases like 'remove all technical objections related to Service Cloud in the sales cycle and to highlight the business value that Service Cloud can bring to any business' directly support this.
job_tasks.phrase: highlight the business value that Service Cloud can bring to any business

job_tasks.justification: While not building core AI models, the role involves configuring and demonstrating solutions, which implies understanding and presenting how software (Service Cloud) works and integrates. Phrases like 'configure and optimally demonstrate the solutions' and 'Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition' suggest a need to understand and present software capabilities and integrations.
job_tasks.phrase: configure and optimally demonstrate the solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding and proposing how different systems integrate, which is a software development-related task in the context of solution architecture. Phrases like 'Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition' point to this.
job_tasks.phrase: Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Agentic systems' and 'using AI within cloud based applications' implies an understanding of how these systems operate in a production environment, even if the role isn't directly managing MLOps. The phrase 'Convey confidence in using AI within cloud based applications' suggests familiarity with the operational aspects of AI in cloud services.
job_tasks.phrase: Convey confidence in using AI within cloud based applications
